casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Justin Deandre BASS 208A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Lisa Miles, Attorney at Law, for Bass, Justin Deandre. Harriet F. Worley, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of June 2018 by Defendant to Dismiss Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
